description: This file defines the interface IPerformance within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace, declaring methods for performance-related operations such as Send, Receive, and Exchange. It includes licensing information and an include guard, indicating it is a header file used for declaring an interface in a C++ project.

classes.name: IPerformance
classes.description: An interface defining performance operations (Send, Receive, and Exchange) in the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. It inherits virtually from Core::IUnknown and is intended for external use with the identifier ID_PERFORMANCE.

methods.name: Send
methods.description: Sends data consisting of sendSize bytes from the buffer.

methods.name: Receive
methods.description: Receives data into buffer, updating bufferSize with the number of bytes received.

methods.name: Exchange
methods.description: Performs a combined send/receive operation up to maxBufferSize, updating bufferSize with the actual size processed.

ctags.name: IPerformance
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IPerformance : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
